text: Its had a little traction on redit, but if breaks every 12 hours or so. So now I have to figure out why the remote version falls over, which is not so simple. I am wondering what the best tool to get connected to it is? Remote debugging? i.e. the devtools wire protocol? Or load tester so I can knock it over locally?
